foreignData.name: Afiyahain
foreignData.text:
Der Afiyahain kommt mit drei +1/+1 Marken ins Spiel.
Lege während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine dieser Marken auf eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl.
Wenn der Afiyahain keine dieser Marken mehr hat, begrabe den Afiyahain.

name: Afiya Grove
originalText:
Afiya Grove comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
During your upkeep, put one of these counters on target creature.
If Afiya Grove has none of these counters on it, bury it.

rulings.text: If there are any creatures on the battlefield, even if they are just your opponent’s, you must put a +1/+1 on one of them. If there are no creatures on the battlefield, then no counter is removed from this card.

text:
Afiya Grove enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, move a +1/+1 counter from Afiya Grove onto target creature.
When Afiya Grove has no +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice it.
